awd_titl_txt: Japanese Manfacturing Management and Plant Effectiveness:   Universal Applicability or a Contingency Approach?
awd_abstract_narration: This is a Minority Research Initiation award for developing a research          proposal involving the applicability of Japanese manufacturing culture          and management to U.S. manufacturing.                                                                                                                           The management and organization of manufacturing is widely recognized           as a major problem in the drive to increase U.S. manufacturing                  productivity.  This award will lead to a research proposal which will           investigate the transferability and applicability of Japanese practices         to the U.S. setting.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Social, Behavioral and Economic Sciences
org_div_long_name: Division of Social and Economic Sciences
